com.receiver2d.engine.entitysystem

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.receiver2d.engine.entitysystem.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Camera, CharacterController, Collider, Rigidbody, Script

    public abstract class Component
extends Object
    Anything that is able to be attached to an Entity, such as a Collider, Rigidbody, CharacterController, et cetera, that provides additional functionality in-game. This class must be extended by all components.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Entity entity
      The current entity that the component is attached to.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        The main tick function that deals with updates to the logical aspect of the component. This is called by the engine's central tick manager.
